you cannot make a 720p rip out of a dvd.  dvd has 480p max.  If you "upconvert" it, you will just add artificial pixels in the voids, which isnt true 720p.  

also, 850mb seems alittle low for a bluray rip.  the Bit Rate must take a huge hit, anything under 3000kbps does deserve to be called HD

@teabag87
right a 720p from a dvd is nt a true HD thats why i havent placed it(Dabang) in the higher movies category...bt thing is my rip will look better than any 480p of 700mb...

look i dont know if u hv read a book or something abt the bit rate being 3000kbps a must for 720p...its not so actually...
and also i dont say my rips r meant for 50' screen or something...
these rips will be best viewed on a 25-26' screen or may be on 32' bt not more than that....
my aim here is to provide small quality rips for bandwidth limited people...
